com.communote.server.core.blog.notes.processors

Class DiscussionNotificationNoteProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.blog.notes.processors.NotificationNoteProcessor
      • com.communote.server.core.blog.notes.processors.DiscussionNotificationNoteProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Orderable, NoteStoringPostProcessor

    public class DiscussionNotificationNoteProcessor
extends NotificationNoteProcessor
    Processor for the @@discussion notation.

    Notifies all authors of parent notes of a note and thus all users that participated in the discussion the note is a part of.

    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiscussionNotificationNoteProcessor

        public DiscussionNotificationNoteProcessor(boolean parentTreeOnly,
                                           BlogRightsManagement topicRightsManagement)
        Constructor which creates a new notification note processor
        Parameters:
        parentTreeOnly - if true only the notes which are in the parent tree of the note to process will be considered. If false all notes of the discussion will be considered.
        topicRightsManagement - Right management for topics.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrder

        public int getOrder()
        Returns:
        the order value which is interpreted as the priority of the extension. The higher the priority, the earlier this extension will be called.

      • getUsersToNotify

        protected Collection<User> getUsersToNotify(Note note,
                                            NoteStoringPostProcessorContext context)
        Retrieves the users to be notified. Implementors need not to be concerned about filtering the user not to notify because this is done in the NotificationNoteProcessor.processAsynchronously(Long, NoteStoringPostProcessorContext) method. Whether users should be ignored if they do not have read access to the blog mainly depends on the type of the notification processor and is thus implementation specific.
        Specified by:
        getUsersToNotify in class NotificationNoteProcessor
        Parameters:
        note - the note to notify about
        context - the context
        Returns:
        the users to notify, can be null

      • process

        public boolean process(Note note,
                       NoteStoringTO noteStoringTO,
                       Map<String,String> properties)
        Allows synchronous processing of a note after it was created or updated. Synchronous means that this method is run within the transaction in which the note was created or updated. Moreover, this method returns whether an asynchronous post-processing of the note by this processor is required. An implementation should be fast and must not modify the note in a way which leads to a semantically invalid note or note hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        note - the note to process
        noteStoringTO - the noteStoringTO that holds the original data which was passed to the note creation/update process
        properties - Properties that can be used to pass some data to the asynchronous post-processing. They will be available in the NoteStoringPostProcessorContext.
        Returns:
        true if this processor also wants to process this note asynchronously
